meanings.definition: A device used to heat something again.
meanings.sent1: The reheaters in the kitchen made the food warm again.
meanings.sent2: The reheaters in the car helped keep the passengers cozy.
meanings.sent3: The reheaters in the microwave were working overtime.
meanings.sent4: Her love was like reheaters, always warming his heart anew.
meanings.sent5: The reheaters hummed softly, bringing life back to the leftovers.

meanings.definition: A person who heats something again.
meanings.sent1: The diligent reheaters in the restaurant ensured every dish was served hot.
meanings.sent2: The reheaters at the campfire warmed up the chilly hikers.
meanings.sent3: The reheaters at the barbecue were on fire with their skills.
meanings.sent4: She was a reheater of memories, always bringing back the good times.
meanings.sent5: The reheaters in the family gatherings kept the stories alive and vibrant.
